attributes.action: As the most senior servants of the people, let MP's pay mirror that of the private sector in their constituencies.
attributes.additional_details: I wish the government to apply to itself its decision to scrap the National Agreement governing Civil Servants pay and to 'freeze' their renumeration until it is in line with the private sector in that region.  This will mean that MP's pay is frozen until it is in line with the private sector in their constituencies, thus showing true leadership and fairness in their dealings with those whom they serve.
